productDescription: The NORTH SEA sweater is handmade and will be made after you order. Therefore the delivery time  will take between 1 -5 days on average.

optionalInfo.fit:
Loose fit.
Alexander wears size M and is 187cm.

Sizes in CM:
XS: Chest circumference 102cm, length 68cm, sleevelength* 80cm
S: Chest circumference 110cm, length 69cm, sleevelength 81cm
M: Chest circumference 118cm, length 70cm, sleevelength 82cm
L: Chest circumference 126cm, length 71cm, sleevelength 83cm
XL: Chest circumference 134cm, length 71cm, sleevelength 84cm

* Sleeve length is measured from the neckline of the top on the shoulders. Because the shoulders are dropped really low, only measuring the actual sleeve length of the top would not be accurate.
optionalInfo.care: Handwash this piece, don’t bleach it, let it dry laying down so it doesn't change in shape, don’t use chemicals while cleaning/washing and iron between 1-2 points.
optionalInfo.production:
This item is handmade by Lara in Zeeland and will be made after your order. 
The clothes are made- to - order to reduce overproduction and waste.
